stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run on his or her last turn. Name a card type, then reveal the grip. Gain 2 credits for each card in the grip that has the named type.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run on his or her last turn.
Name a card type, then reveal the grip. Gain 2[credit] for each card in the grip that has the named type.
title: Standard Procedure
